be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class VersionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.VersionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VersionViewController.ViewListener

    public class VersionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements VersionViewController.ViewListener
    Handle the logic of the versioning of a project This class is the listener of the VersionViewController.ViewListener.
    This will manage the interaction on the VersionView.fxml view.
